item.description:
Week 3 coming up. Time to start moving forward by adding more steps and more dances. If you are thinking that Line Dance may be what your looking for then you want to jump in this next week. No more backing up. Forward is our direction now. Swingin' Thing, Cupid Shuffle, Mamma Maria, Electric Slide, Ah Si, Country As Can Be and more.

 

Cost 8.00 lesson
item.how_to_find_us: We are on the second floor this repeats weekly
item.name: Lets Get Ready to Turn it Up a Notch (Progressive Line Dance)
